summary: 1/26/17:  IT WAS 45 DEGREES THIS MORNING SO I USED THE REMOTE START (FACTORY SUPPLIED ON KEY REMOTE) TO GET MY TRUCK RUNNING BEFORE LEAVING FOR WORK. AS I WALKED OUTSIDE (DID NOT TOUCH THE TRUCK), I HEARD A LOUD GUNSHOT. THINKING SOMETHING HAD FALLEN ON THE TRUCK I LOOKED UP AND IT WAS NOT PARKED UNDER ANYTHING. I WALKED AROUND THE TRUCK TO FIND THAT THE DRIVERS SIDE PANEL OF THE BACK WINDOW WAS SPIDERED. AGAIN, I WAS NOT DRIVING OR PARKED UNDER OR AROUND SOMETHING THAT COULD HAVE IMPACTED MY TRUCK/WINDOW.
